description.full_text:
Dizajn i proizvod
Kreirajte bez ograničenja with Creation 40 Clic : where design meets innovation
ultra-realistične designs: ultra-realistične textures, velvet-touch surfaces and elegant ultra-matt finish
Novi površinski utisci: raznovrsne teksture that bring each design to life
Available formats: XL planks, standard planks and rectangular tiles - designed to suit every space
Smart Design: poboljšana vizuelna varijacija on selected designs for dublja realističnost
Smart Comfort innovation: acoustic top layer for walking comfort, thermal comfort, sound reduction and easy cutting
Rigid core: ideal for renovation, compatible with existing subfloors, resistant to temperature variations
Lightweight construction: easier to transport, handle and install
From floor to wall: create besprekorna harmonija with our Mural Revela Collection
Ugradnja i održavanje
Fold Down clic system: fast, secure and dust-free installation
No glue required: perfect for installation in front of bay windows or on sensitive surfaces
